name: Typebot
title: typebot.io
shortDescription: Typebot is a no-code platform that allows users to create and integrate chatbots into various platforms like websites and WhatsApp. It is designed for businesses of all sizes to enhance customer engagement through conversational AI. Users can build bots with features like text, images, videos, and various input options, and deploy them across multiple channels. An example use case is automating customer support to handle inquiries and improve response times.
cons: May require technical knowledge for advanced features
Dependent on third-party integrations for some features

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: MobileMonkey
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Strong in SMS and Facebook bots
